post:
★ starts at $5/m ★ KVM Unmanaged ★ Tons of space & IPs ★ Dedicated Ressources ★

Hostabulous, Business Hosting Specialist | Proudly Canadian
We have been in business since 2001 under the fusionX brand, which was targeting local business customers (Canada, Québec).
We rebranded to Hostabulous in late 2013 to provide the same service, reliability and agressive pricing to a world wide audience.


Facts
■ We are not resellers, we maintain and admin our own servers (no VPS/VDS).
■ Our servers administrators are in the web hosting industry for more than a decade.
■ We keep our servers as fast as possible and not oversold for maximum stability & security.
■ Servers are always up to date, and monitored 24/7 for any hardware or network issues.
■ Unlike some competitors, that pretend 24/7 support but are unable to resolve your issues in less than a few days, our support staff works from 8:30am to midnight (EST) 7 days a week, and quickly resolve any issues you may have.

Thanks for reading, if you have any questions feel free to submit a support ticket, we will reply ASAP!



=========
